description.translate: The lily is your virtue, the rose your anger and the columbine your sorrow.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Méjobora\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Le lys est ta vertu, la rose ta colère\"}","{\"text\":\"§7et l'ancolie ta peine.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7The lily is your virtue, the rose your anger\"}","{\"text\":\"§7and the columbine your sorrow.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7RES§a1 §7HER§a3 §7LUC§a1\"}"],color:16776099}}
